name: Croc vs Blobs
description:
Description:
Short and janky game for the 'Coding Blocks Game Jam 22'.
Use your momentum to pummel the blobs with your red ball into oblivion.

Controls: 

  • Movement: WASD
  • Options: P

In coorparation with https://sanguinesun.itch.io/

Credits:
Sounds and audio from zapsplat.com
